name: Nicolás the Sea Urchin
summary:
One day, Nicolás was hungry, so he decides to make a seaweed burger, but something he didn't know is that the burger was the most perfect burger that was ever cooked.
Suddenly, Loquendumbo breaks into his house and steals the burger! Don't let that bastard easily get away with your burger, control Nicolás and travel through the inmense and amazing underwater world!
